download.title: Download
download.draftInfo: When you save as draft, only you and people with shared access will be able to see this plan.

feedback.title: Feedback & Collaboration
feedback.description: Allow people to access, edit or comment on this plan

markComplete.title: Marked as complete.
markComplete.description: We have updated your plan to completed - if you have made a mistake you can mark it as incomplete
markComplete.step1Description: You can download the completed plan
markComplete.step2Description: Publishing a Data Management Plan (DMP) assigns it a Digital Object Identifier (DOI). This DOI uniquely identifies the DMP, facilitating easy reference and access in the future.

markIncomplete.title: Marked as incomplete.
markIncomplete.description: We have updated your plan as incomplete.

publish.title: Publish
publish.description1: Publishing a Data Management Plan (DMP) marks it as "complete" and assigns it a Digital Object Identifier (DOI).
publish.description2: This DOI uniquely identifies the DMP, facilitating easy reference and access in the future.
publish.visibilityDescription: You can control what parts of your plan are or are not visible once it is published.

public.label: Public (recommended)
public.description: All metadata will be visible to any user. Researchers will be able to view the contents of the plan itself.

organization.label: Organization only
organization.description: The full plan will be visible to anyone within your Organization. Only basic metadata about your plan (title and collaborators) will be visible to users outside your organization.

private.label: Private
private.description: Only basic metadata about your plan (title and collaborators) will be visible to other users.
